summary: Incredibly detailed high resolution retexture (including specular and bumpmaps) of the ebony chainmail.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces all the textures associated the body armour Ebony Chainmail. The effort into this was more than you would think, alot of it is done soley by hand.

Specular Map - 512x512 now 4096x4096
Texture Map - 1024x1024 now 4096x4096
Bump Map - 512x512 now 2048x2048

This armour looks fantastic in game, even if you dislike the images you should try it!

If you liked this there check it out my other package for normal ebony armour (beta stages but still looks good).
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=962

Right now this mod is only for females, it will be a little while before (and if) I do the male version, sorry!

To get this armour ingame - cheat way. 
1. type ~ (tilde) to bring up console
2. Enter the following: player.additem 00052794 1
And now it should be in your inventory. Enjoy!

(NOTE: The armour has an annoying special effect, when you crouch or get attacked it activates a \'poison\' release mode where the armour turns completely black with whispy smoke coming off it, if anyone knows how to remove this PLEASE post it in comments.)
author: eXtacy
